channel.title: My Portfolio on Rayaan Juvale
channel.description: Recent content in My Portfolio on Rayaan Juvale

item.title: Reddit Data Pipeline and Analysis
item.description:
This project implements a Reddit data pipeline for collecting, storing, and analyzing posts from the top 20 US-based subreddits. It includes the following components:

  1. Data Extraction (ETL Service):

    • Uses the Reddit API via the praw library to fetch hot posts from subreddits.
    • Stores the data in a PostgreSQL database (reddit_posts table).
    • Analyzes the data to identify trending topics and stores the results in the trending_topics table.

  2. Database (PostgreSQL):

    • Stores raw Reddit posts and processed trending topics.
    • Automatically initializes tables using an init.sql script during container startup.

  3. Frontend (Streamlit):

item.title: About
item.description:
I am Rayaan Juvale, a passionate and driven individual with a background in engineering and data analytics. I thrive on solving complex problems, blending technical expertise with creativity to develop innovative solutions. My experiences range from designing automated systems to optimizing processes through data-driven insights.

Beyond academics and work, I have a deep love for English football and proudly support my favorite team, Chelsea. Football teaches me teamwork, resilience, and the importance of strategy values I carry into every aspect of my life.
